tree.name: Jaden McDaniels
tree.tradeDescription: 3-team draft night trade: MIN acquired Ricky Rubio and draft rights to Jaden McDaniels (#28) from OKC, and draft rights to Leandro Bolmaro (#23) from NYK. MIN sent James Johnson and draft rights to Aleksej Pokuševski (#17) to OKC, and draft rights to Mathias Lessort + DET 2023 2nd round pick to NYK.
tree.note: Washington forward, drafted 28th overall by LAL (on behalf of OKC via Schroder trade), then traded to MIN

assetsGivenUp.name: 2020 1st Round Pick (#17)
assetsGivenUp.note: MIN original 2020 1st round pick, used to select Pokuševski for OKC

assetsGivenUp.name: 2024 2nd Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: MIN 2024 2nd round pick, sent to OKC
